attributes.action: sack the MPs responsible for the expenses claims scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it was you or me responsible for theft or misuse of public funds the system would make an example of us with prosecution and likely imprisonment, therefore why should MPs be any different after all they make the laws of the land so should lead by example and abide by them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
